name: Crazy 21
description:
Overview

Crazy 21 is a fast paced take on the traditional card game of 21. The object of the game is to score points by making as many 21s as possible before the time runs out.

Gameplay

In Crazy 21 you deal cards to one of three hands, trying to make a total of 21 with any set of adjacent cards. Space in each hand is limited and once a hand is full it can no longer be used. However, when you make a 21 those cards will be removed from play giving you more space to work.

Each game is timed, which means you have to find a balance between thinking fast and placing each card carefully.

Bonuses are awarded for making special 21s (such as a 21 made up of three 7s) and consecutive 21s increase the score multiplier.

Your challenge awaits...
